name: phonographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or involving the recording of sounds using electronic equipment: She tried to make a phonographic recording of her own voice. He was never happier than when browsing through his extensive library of phonographic records.
More examplesFewer examplesThomas Edison invented the phonographic cylinder in 1877.She planned to create phonographic books for the blind.The broadcast consisted of a phonographic recording of Beethoven's third symphony.Our company owns the exclusive rights to the phonographic reproduction of this material.
